subject: New York City Marathon
Running
lead_paragraph: The Ethiopian runner Haile Gebrselassie, who said he was retiring after pulling out midway through Sunday’s New York City Marathon with a knee injury, said he was having second thoughts.
snippet: The Ethiopian runner Haile Gebrselassie, who said he was retiring after pulling out midway through Sunday’s New York City Marathon with a knee injury, said he was having second thoughts.
